# Trying out Bookdown or Markdown

This chapter is an overview of the methods that
can be used to style text in **Markdown**.

## Bold text

Use 2 x asteriks to make it ***bold**

## Italics

Use 1 asteriks on each side to make *italics*

## Add code

    code = "add 4 spaces before"
    
 or
    
'''code in back ticks'''
